0 FILE wag_courage_calibration_compass.mpd
0 Name: WAG-Courage Calibration – Compass Scene (Baseplate + Stack + Minifig + Carrot)
0 Author: DCE-GYO Undaunted Pipeline
0 !LDRAW_ORG Model
0 !LICENSE Redistributable under CCAL version 2.0
0 BFC CERTIFY CCW

0 BASEPLATE – 16 x 16 at origin
1 1 0 0 0  1 0 0  0 1 0  0 0 1  3811.dat

 
0  - These should form a vertical column in wag-courage
1 1 -40 -24 0  1 0 0  0 1 0  0 0 1  3001.dat
1 1 -40 -48 0  1 0 0  0 1 0  0 0 1  3001.dat
1 1 -40 -72 0  1 0 0  0 1 0  0 0 1  3001.dat

0 MINIFIG – based on minifig-blue.mpd, simplified
0  - Torso at origin on top of baseplate, feet resting on studs
1 1  40 -64  20  1 0 0  0 1 0  0 0 1  973c01.dat
1 1  40 -32  20  1 0 0  0 1 0  0 0 1  3815.dat
1 14 40 -91 20  1 0 0  0 1 0  0 0 1  3626bp01.dat

0 MINIFIG LEGS – simple left/right legs under hips
1 0  40 -20  20  1 0 0  0 1 0  0 0 1  3816.dat
1 0  40 -20  20  1 0 0  0 1 0  0 0 1  3817.dat

0 MINIFIG RIGHT ARM + HAND – extended to hold carrot (approximate)
1 1  55 -55  20  0.985 0.174 0 -0.174 0.985 0  0 0 1  3819.dat
1 14 57 -46  20  0.985 0.174 0 -0.174 0.985 0  0 0 1  3820.dat

0 CARROT – held in right hand
1 25 60 -42 20  1 0 0  0 1 0  0 0 1  33172c01.dat

0 COMPASS BRICKS – axis markers around origin
0  - X+ (red), X- (red)
1 4  40  0 -60  1 0 0  0 1 0  0 0 1  3003.dat
1 4 -40  0 -60  1 0 0  0 1 0  0 0 1  3003.dat
0  - Z+ (blue), Z- (blue)
1 1   0  0  60  1 0 0  0 1 0  0 0 1  3003.dat
1 1   0  0 -60  1 0 0  0 1 0  0 0 1  3003.dat
0  - Y up test: small brick above baseplate
1 2   0 -24   0  1 0 0  0 1 0  0 0 1  3003.dat
